data.prayer: Father, as people seek answers on the internet, please help them find the gospel in Yaracuy, Venezuela.
data.verse: So I say to you, ask, and it will be given to you; seek, and you will find; knock, and it will be opened to you.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Yaracuy, Venezuela
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Over 17.39 percent of the people of Yaracuy are far from Jesus.
Father, encourage the 72,671 believers to have boldness before you, since they have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus the Son of God.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.prayer: Father, help your children in Yaracuy, Venezuela find someone like the Samaritan Woman today. Someone who will open an entire town to your message of salvation.
data.verse: So the woman left her water jar and went away into town and said to the people, 29 “Come, see a man who told me all that I ever did. Can this be the Christ?” They went out of the town and were coming to him.

data.prayer: Lord, you sent Jesus as a witness to testify about the light so that all the Turk people might believe through him.
Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Yaracuy, Venezuela today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.

data.prayer: Father, defend those who are loyal to your Word in the state of Yaracuy, even against fierce enemies.
data.verse: Though the wicked bind me with ropes, I will not forget your law.

data.section_summary:
the state of Yaracuy, Venezuela has a population of 597,700.

We estimate Yaracuy has 72,671 people who might know Jesus, 421,074 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 103,955 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 8 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, please raise up evangelists to equip your people to share the gospel in Yaracuy.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
